posts.title:
Dear Mr. President Trump,

We have approx. 450,000 Illegals in City, County Jails and in State prisons. Start deporting all Illegals out of State Prisons acrossed the USA. Mark them "Banned for Life". Send their finger prints, dna, and picture to all Immigration points across  the Country
posts.content:
so they cannot ever re- enter.

As the prisons empty, move Illegals from the City and County jails to the prisons for deportation out of the Country.

This is the most cost efficent way and everthing is already in place. Instead of working from the Ground Up looking for some place to house them, We work the Ground Down Program.

Any illegal picked by ICE, Local Police, County Sheriffs, US Marshalls, and FBI would be dropped off at the closest County or City jails for daily or weekly transfers to State Prison for deportation as State prison population drops due to the deportations taking place there.

They would not be tried for the crimes they have commited, they would not serve out any court sentences already imposed. The jails, and prisons are basically already full. With many more crimes being commited daily by illegals. Most get released back on the streets due to overcrowed jails and prisons.

Their punishment would be a BANNED FOR LIFE FROM ENTERING THE USA. For Illegaly Coming to the USA.

Some people would would want to see them kept in prison for the loss or damage that was inflicted on them. I understand that, but in reality most are given early parole due to the new criminals coming into the system and they simply don't have room to keep all of them. So they release them.

The cost savings by deporting all of them instead of incarceration would pay for the Airplane cost, etc to get them out of the Country. It would also save money for years to come by deporting them.

The Ground Down Program is already in place. We just need to add Airplanes for departure to what ever Country we are sending them to when we have a full plane load.

The Federal Prison system also has an additional approx. 22,000 Illegals currently being held. BANNED FOR LIFE FROM ENTERING THE USA, Deport. This would free up more beds for the deportation process.

There maybe Illegals that have commited murders that you feel must be contained and are not safe for release anywhere in the World. We can ship those murders to El Salvador where President Bukele's generous offer to house criminals in El Salvador at a low cost. Since the criminals are illegals we would not be breaking any laws that apply to U.S. Citizens.

The latest cost for housing a Illegal in a Federal Prison is $42,672.00 a year.

The cost for State prison ranges from just under $23,023.0 per person in Arkansas to 145,000.00 to $200,000.00 plus in Massachusetts per year adjusted for inflation since 2023.

In order to deport an estimated 30 Million plus Illegals that have invaded the USA, A very Aggressive program has to be implemented. The Ground Down Program allows Mr. Tom Homan to hire additional ICE agents and or use Federal troops to be as aggressive as necessary to remove 30 Million within four years or sooner. With the correct resources and deportation system he can acheive this goal.
